Really an attention grabbing fan with futuristic and attractive design.
Compatively silent than regular fans. Silent nature of this fan gives a false
feeling that its less breezy compared to ordinary fans. I actually did a blind
and 'deaf' test to compare this fan with a regular one. And the conclusion was
the air circulation produced by this fan is at par with other ceiling fans if
not better.

fans. But "Aeroquiet" produces as much as noise, if not more. I am severely
disappointed beyond limits. I am unable to recommend this one to anyone. In
fact , the manufacturer must seriously consider refunding a portion. The only
saving grace is an attractive design.

KKK very good
review:
I have bought it a six month back and really very satisfied with the fan and
have ordered two others.  
I gone through different reviews and found some one has written that it has
very low speed that is true but the air flow is higher than high speed fan. In
beginning I was thinking that I have made mistake by buying this fan but on
use of a week I realise that it is giving more air than my previous 370 RPM
Fan.  
Excellent built quality, Very low noise. Consume 62 Watts of power which is
again low. It attracts very low amount of dust on blades and no need to worry
to frequent clean of blades as it is built of glass filled fibre so it can't
get damaged from unclean dust.  
I recommend this fan to buyers who actually looking for beauties in fan.

Its a premium product. It adds to the premium look of your house. Its quiet
and the breeze covers more area compared to traditional design fans.

Awesome quality, great performance, very high airflow. There is one more model
with Orient Electric which has same shape, size and colors but it has BLDC
Technology I strongly recommend to buy that model as it consumes about half
the Electricity compared to this model. BLDC model is priced little higher
than this one but it's worth buying. No doubt this model is great too compared
to other fans in market.

Received without the back cover on 2 of the fan blades. Returned for
correction and resupply.  
Received the same piece the second time as well. Had to cancel and look
offline for the product.

I needed a new fan for my bedroom as my Havells fan was making a lot of noise
despite repairs. I needed a silent fan to have less noise interference when I
have my headphones on.  
  
Pros:  
The build quality of the fan is excellent. It also has a premium look to it.
It looks really good. The motor is also heavy which does not necessarily mean
but can be an indicator of durability.  
On a 5 step regulator, the fan is truly silent on steps 1 and 2. Even on rest
of the steps the fan is comparatively silent than other fans. The only noise
audible is that of the wind.  
  
Cons:  
Orient has sacrificed some RPM to make the fan silent which in turn affects
the airflow as compared to other fans. The air does not reach uniformly
outside the radius of the fan. Due to this the fan can only be recommended for
small bedrooms and not master bedrooms or living rooms with an exception if it
needs to be placed above a TV or any other audio system to reduce
interference.  
  
Overall great aesthetics, good at being silent but sub par performance which
is very disappointing for the premium price tag.

The misconception with this fan is that it’s not fast enough. But it doesn’t
have to be. I use this fan at 25-50% of the speed there is sufficient airflow
to keep the air moving but nothing that will blow your papers and clothes
away. It is for those who want a quiet room. The joints between the blades and
the motor are thick and strong expect no loosening any time soon and those
metal noises due to vibrations.

Not as silent as claimed but better than most. Plus they look awesome.

It is pricey. It is less noisy than traditional fans. Is it worth the price?
!!!

review:
This phone look very nice . The company say that the fan motor s very powerful
but speed is very slow as compared to other normalceiling fans. The company do
not indicate maximum speed to the customers and the customers like me repent
once see fan's performance. This fan no doubt look very good and like premium
product which immediately catch attention of the visitors.However have found
this fan is not giving desired speed at the cost of Rs.4,500 per fan. The
customers should buy such products and they see the performance of this fan.

Nice fan. Almost soundless. ordered one from Orient website. It took 30 days
to receive in Delhi. But particularly the fan looks awesome when switched off.
Ultimately you have to switch it on if you want air flow. Covers almost all
corners of a room. Reordered another one from Amazon just now.

The blade made of plastic. So this fan is suitable for AC rooms with low rpm
which is only used to spread the ac air to all the corner of the room. So
don’t buy if you are thinking to use it as a general purpose.

The product is contemporary from the looks perspective. But in my opinion its
not worth the price. It is less noisy as compare to normal fans (30-40%) but
not 3 times price er than the normal ones. if you are looking for a good
contemporary fan for a room with A/C this could be a good choice. if good air
is the only criteria then 100+ good options are out there.. think twice for
looks v/s value for money and then seal the deal..

Looks good but small design issue which cause difficulties and scratches
during installation. Otherwise it's an awesome fan.

1\. It as good as it is in the photo.  
2\. It was nicely packed in a single carton.  
3\. It was slightly complicated for assembling.  
4\. The performance is very good.

Look wise as well as overall quality are quite good. Speed is comparatively
far better than any other product. The name 'airoquiet' is suitable for this
product.

the claim of being silent is false. no need to spend more.

Aeroquiet is only a marketing term. noisy like other fans. buy a BLDC fan
rather than this.

Pros: Looks, quality and decent air flow  
Cons: Not as noise free as advertised. It does make noise. I was under the
impression that the noise will be so low that you would not know if its on
till you see it. But thats not the case. You can both feel and hear the fan
clearly. The rod size does seem to be long.  
  
Overall, if you want to buy just because you think its noise free, do a
physical check if you can. Else you can be disappointed.

Purchased this fan because of aerodynamic looks and it's silent features as
posted in YouTube videos and as is advertised.  
The fan received from Amazon is perfectly okay, after assembling same noted
the following :  
Pros  
1\. Relatively quiet at max speed than other fan  
2\. Looks exactly as advertised  
  
Cons  
1\. The rpm of the fan is atleast 20% less than my last fan  
2\. Obviously the airflow is less, 30% less than standard fan because of low
rpm of the motor  
3\. I live in home where each room hight is above 11 feet, air flow not
reaching if you are sitting on floor, only can feel the air if standing up!!  
4\. Airflow only effective within the blades rotating radius, even 1 feet away
from blade rotating radius - almost no airflow even while standing  
Not worth buying for ineffective airflow, although looks excellent

This fan is really quiet. Perfect when watching TV. Good finish too and the
overall looks are superb. I'm glad Orient has taken pains to produce and
market a high quality, something not so common with Indian manufacturers.
